name: Anti-anti-semitism
description: Jewish people have consistently been subject to horrible conspiracy theories and persecution. Israel's horrible genocide must not never take away that anti-semitism is unacceptable. Also, we need a better word for this.

name: Anti-poverty
description: What if people could afford food and housing

name: Anti-warmongering
description: War has become a profitable industry that turns innocent lives into money

name: Disability rights
description: Don't rest until about every location and website is well accessible and disabled people can get married without huge financial consequences

name: Free Palestine
description: What if we would stop colonising

name: Polyamorous rights
description: If someone wants to marry multiple people, they should be allowed to

name: Privacy
description: Privacy is an important pursuit. “If you have nothing to hide, you have nothing to fear” doesn’t work when what and who is illegal can be changed by the government at any time

name: Pro-choice
description: This includes abortion and the right to do with your body and clothes as you wish. This does not include wearing clear hate symbols and declining life-saving medical procedures like vaccinations

name: Pro-diversity
description: Not staying isolated with those who were born right next to you is good for you

name: Queer Rights
description: This refers mostly to things in terms of orientation & the rights thereof. Trans & polyamorous rights are in seperate subjects

name: Right to housing
description: There are enough buildings for all of us. Unused and empty buildings should house those who cannot afford to otherwise

name: Right to protest
description: People should be allowed to protest - and counterprotest - as wanted

name: Trans Rights
description: Providing support, safety & medical help to every trans person that wants it
